title: Neumi skin
product_desc: The skincare solution revolutionized with HydraStat Nano-Technology for rapid absorption and with a convenient spray application.

items.caption: Key ingredients to maximize absorption and effectiveness, daily.
Every batch undergoes rigorous third-party testing to ensure commitment to purity and safety.
We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, no questions asked.

tab.title: See how Neumi Skin is changing lives

review_list.review_text: Neumi Skin has been a game-changer for me! I've been using it for a few months now, and I've noticed a significant improvement in my energy levels and overall vitality. It's amazing how something so simple can have such profound effects. Highly recommend!

I've struggled with maintaining hormone balance for years, but Neumi Skin has made a world of difference. Not only do I feel more balanced and energized, but I've also noticed improvements in my skin tone and muscle tone. It's truly remarkable!

product_benefits.title: Benefits of using Neumi Skin
product_benefits.desc: Neumi Skin’s breakthrough technology nano-sizes critical ingredients, making absorption fast and effective. Our spray delivery system makes it easy to apply Neumi Skin multiple times a day under or over makeup.

items.title: Ingredients You Can Trust
items.desc: Neumi Skin uses our HydraStat™ nano-delivery system to maximize absorption and effectiveness of the following ingredients: glutathione, hyaluronic acid, collagen, and curcumin.

items.title: Results You Can See
items.desc: Our unique HydraStat Nano-Technology breaks down ingredients into tiny particles, ensuring they reach deep into your skin for faster and enhanced results. Experience minimized pores, lifted firmness, smoothed fine lines, and a brighter complexion. Neumi's innovation delivers radiant, fresh skin with breakthrough Nano-Technology!

items.title: Easy Application
items.desc: Simplify your skincare routine with Neumi Skin. Just spritz and let air-dry, under or over makeup!

product_post_list.title: Innovative science
product_post_list.desc: Glutathione is the protector and detoxifier of the cell. It’s the key to the life, health, performance, protection and longevity of every human cell.

product_post_list.title: HydraStat™ nanotechnology
product_post_list.desc: Nano-sized particles protected by ultra-pure water clusters. Our nanosized ingredients are small enough to be fully absorbed into the human cell.

product_post_list.title: Quality over quantity
product_post_list.desc: A supplement is only as good as its bioavailability, which is its ability to be absorbed and used by the body. The correct delivery system delivers ingredients to your body in a way that your body can absorb and use.

key_ingredients.title: Neumi Skin key ingredients
key_ingredients.ingredients: Active Ingredients: ULTRA-PURE WATER, GLUTATHIONE, Dimethyl Sulfone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cysteine, Proline, Calcium Ascorbate, Glycine, Arginine, Valine, Curcumin, Hydroxyproline, Collagen, Potassium Sorbate, Tartaric Acid. *IMAGE SHOWS A PLANT/FOOD IN WHICH THE ACTIVE INGREDIENT IS FOUND AND NOT NECESSARILY WHERE it is EXTRACTed FROM.

steps.caption: Hold sprayer about 8-10 inches from your face and spritz all over. This can be done before or after makeup.
For best results, let the mist air dry without rubbing in.
Repeat these steps twice a day. Feel free to use Neumi Skin more often, if desired.
Neumi Skin is best paired with a moisturizer and SPF.

items.desc: Glutathione is able to neutralize free radicals and protect the body from their harmful effects. It also helps to reduce inflammation, and supports the body's natural ability to fight off infection. In addition, it plays a role in the synthesis of new immune cells, keeping your immune system functioning at its best.
